item.title: How To Learn New Programming Language Quickly
item.description: Our job requires us to learn new programming languages once in a while. Some languages are easy while others have steep learning curve. I would have wished if there was a templte for learning languages because each language has similar concepts but with different syntax. Once you understand what is common between the language you know and the language you want to learn, all that is left is to master the syntax which comes with some practice.
